title: Indian Journal of Rheumatology
text: The Indian Journal of Rheumatology is the official <a href="Academic%20journal">journal</a> of the <a href="Indian%20Rheumatology%20Association">Indian Rheumatology Association</a>. It is peer reviewed and published quarterly since 2006 and was formerly published as the Journal of Indian Rheumatism Association from 1993 until 2005. The first <a href="editor-in-chief">editor-in-chief</a> of the renamed journal was Ashok Kumar (AIIMS,).
